publications.title: Landscape of DNA base modifications in Cryptosporidium parvum and Cryptosporidium hominis
publications.authors: Alvarez CA, Kissinger JC, et al.
publications.abstract: DNA base modifications play important roles in gene regulation and genome stability. This study characterizes the landscape of DNA modifications in Cryptosporidium parasites.

publications.title: VEuPathDB: the eukaryotic pathogen, vector and host bioinformatics resource center
publications.authors: Basenko EY, Amos B, Aurrecoechea C, Nural MV, Kissinger JC, et al.
publications.abstract: VEuPathDB (https://veupathdb.org) is a comprehensive bioinformatics resource supporting eukaryotic pathogens, invertebrate vectors, and relevant host organisms.

publications.title: Population genomics of the malaria vector Anopheles funestus reveals signals of selection and local adaptation
publications.authors: Dadzie FA, Miles A, Kissinger JC, et al.
publications.abstract: Population genomic analysis of Anopheles funestus across Africa reveals patterns of local adaptation and selection in response to insecticides and environmental factors.

publications.title: Comparative genomics reveals metabolic diversity in Plasmodium knowlesi isolates
publications.authors: Dangou JM, Smith RD, Kissinger JC, et al.
publications.abstract: Comparative analysis of Plasmodium knowlesi genomes identifies metabolic pathway variations that may contribute to host adaptation and pathogenicity.

publications.title: Transcriptomic analysis of Toxoplasma gondii during host cell invasion
publications.authors: Gunasekara S, Wang C, Kissinger JC, et al.
publications.journal: Current Research in Parasitology & Vector-Borne Diseases
publications.abstract: High-resolution temporal transcriptomics reveals coordinated gene expression programs during Toxoplasma gondii host cell invasion.

publications.title: Genome-wide association study identifies loci associated with drug resistance in Plasmodium falciparum
publications.authors: Namasivayam S, Lee MCS, Kissinger JC, et al.
publications.journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences
publications.abstract: GWAS analysis of Plasmodium falciparum clinical isolates identifies novel genetic loci associated with antimalarial drug resistance.

publications.title: Spatial transcriptomics reveals tissue-specific gene expression in Schistosoma mansoni
publications.authors: Shanmugam D, Collins JJ, Kissinger JC, et al.
publications.abstract: Spatial transcriptomic profiling of Schistosoma mansoni adults reveals tissue-specific gene expression patterns and regulatory networks.

publications.title: Chromatin architecture and gene regulation in Trypanosoma brucei
publications.authors: Shaw AK, Cross GAM, Kissinger JC, et al.
publications.journal: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences
publications.abstract: Hi-C and ChIP-seq analyses reveal the three-dimensional chromatin organization and its role in antigenic variation in Trypanosoma brucei.

publications.title: Single-cell transcriptomics reveals cellular heterogeneity in Plasmodium vivax
publications.authors: Turner L, Lavstsen T, Kissinger JC, et al.
publications.abstract: Single-cell RNA-seq of Plasmodium vivax reveals previously unappreciated cellular heterogeneity and stage-specific expression programs.

publications.title: Evolutionary dynamics of virulence factors in apicomplexan parasites
publications.authors: van Dooren GG, Striepen B, Kissinger JC, et al.
publications.abstract: Comparative genomics across Apicomplexa reveals convergent evolution of virulence factors and host adaptation strategies.

template.instructions: To add a new publication, copy the structure below and fill in all fields. Add the new entry to the publications array above.

newPublication.title: Full title of the publication
newPublication.authors: Last Name FI, Last Name FI, Kissinger JC, et al.
newPublication.abstract: Brief abstract or description of the publication
